'''Yong''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] and [[spell]] inventor who lived during the [[Golden Age]].
document_data.History: Yong developed three spells in their lifetime. The spells they invented were ''[[imprisonment]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|2185|NY}}, ''[[binding]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|2190|NY}}, and finally, ''[[vanish]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|2192|NY}}.
